title: JacksClub
author: JacksClub
content: Hello Bitcointalk Community!Every Week a new Bonus: Massive Bonuses up to $150,000!Deposit & Enjoy the Festive Cheer & Happy Holidays from Jack's Club!Terms & Conditions apply.

comments.author: panjul07
comments.body: Quote from: JacksClub on December 07, 2023, 04:19:06 PMHello Bitcointalk Community!Every Week a new Bonus: Massive Bonuses up to $150,000!It would be nice if you have separated page for this bonus along with terms and conditions for the bonus, I cant find at least a banner for this promotion in your homepage. Lets make it simple, how this bonus works? Is the bonus credited automatically as unlocked bonus which players do not need to claim by inserting a code? As per general terms, the formula to unlock bonus is adjusted_wager / 50 * 20%, is it the same formula applied for this Massive Bonuses? Or there are maybe some other different terms for this bonus which cant be found in the general TC page?

comments.author: Blowon
comments.body: The bonus information is not detailed and causes confusion for me personally, there are many gambling platforms that often provide deposit bonuses, and I once tried to get a bonus but it was far from being a bonus, instead of getting a profit, it turned out that the requirements for claiming the bonus were very unreasonable.
